column4: Does anyone knows if the 7.10 ubuntu-version includes the new kernel 2.6.36???
Feisty is still running the older kernel.
The card doesn't work at all?
no...no way...and I don't know what to do...:-(
What card is it again?
Ok, bear with me, I'm going to see if I can't help you out
On feisty?
Really...yes...one moment..please...
I've got an Dell...with an "WifiCatcher"...maybe this is the problem...?
Have you looked at this? http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=493095&highlight=Feisty+Intel+AGN+Wifi+4965
yes i tried this guide...but it doesn't work...
If WifiCatcher is software, it won't affect ubuntu, obviously...if it's hardware, the problem should be addressed.
Ok, what problem are you having after following the guide?
Ok, let me read a litttle.
thank you very much!
http://intellinuxwireless.org/
yeah...this is the site...I used these files too...the same error during the execution on the file...
I can go to ubuntu and give you the error-message, ok?
Ok.
> I just found out, that there is no package for debian...maybe thats the prob?
